channel.title: structural-patterns on Pwn the world.

item.title: Structural Patterns
item.description: Structural Design Patterns help in composing small structures into larger structures, while ensuring that these larger structures remain flexible and efficient. These larger structures remain simplified through the realization of the relationship between it’s smaller component structures, that is, how each component inherits from each other. Structural Class Patterns Composes interfaces and implementations through (multiple) inheritance. Useful to make independently developed classes work together. Structural Object Patterns Realizes new functionality through composition of different objects.
